title: Indonesia: time of transition
creator_credit: Peter Drummond and Beaumaris Film Productions
brief_description: A look at the contrasts to be found in Indonesia. Shows life in Djakarta, the island of Bali, subsistence farming, and Western influences on the traditional culture. Mentions the new spirit of nationalism, the role of the students and the high birth rate. Interviews two military commanders who talk about the political situation.
